message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this amazing product! I think it's a great fit for you, and I'm willing to sell it to you for $180.
I'm really interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $120. Would you be willing to meet me at that price?
I understand you're looking to save some money, Bob! I'm willing to meet you halfway between our original offer and your counteroffer. How about we try $160?
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but I'm still a bit above my budget. How about we try $140?
I understand you're trying to be frugal, Bob! I'm willing to make one more concession. How about we try $155?
I appreciate your flexibility, but I'm still not comfortable with that price. How about we try $145?
I understand you're trying to get the best deal, Bob! I'm willing to make one more concession, but I'm not willing to go any lower. How about we try $152?
I appreciate your willingness to make concessions, but I'm still a bit above my budget. I'm willing to meet you at $150, but that's as low as I can go.
